titles.title: We Are The Body Of Christ

properties.copyright: 1997 New Spring / SongWard Music / Integrity's Hosanna! Music, Administered by Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc. / The Copy

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
One heart one spirit
One voice to praise You
We are the body of Christ
One goal one vision
To see You exalted
We are the body of Christ
And to this we give our lives
To see You glorified
